snippet: A spokeswoman for the Israeli hospital where the wounded Palestinian was taken for treatment said he was a 10-year-old boy.
abstract: Israeli forces patrolling border with Gaza Strip shoot and wound Palestinian as he approaches border fence and take him to Israeli hospital; spokeswoman says Palestinian is 10-year-old boy.

byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: A spokeswoman for the Israeli hospital where the wounded Palestinian was taken for treatment said he was a 10-year-old boy.

headline.main: Palestinian Shot by Israeli Troops at Gaza Border
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Shot by Israeli Troops at Gaza Border
